# Introduction

This report analyzes the top 10 trending events from the GDELT dataset.

```{r, results='asis'}
# Load precomputed data
sorted_data <- readRDS("precomputed_data.rds")

# Display top 10 trending events
knitr::kable(sorted_data)
```
